how-geocaching.title: How does geocaching work?
how-geocaching.text: How does geocaching work? Geocaching is a unique adventure game of the Kraken Project for finding treasure caches scattered in different countries of the world. In order to get a valuable prize, players need to solve riddles and puzzles, as well as find certain locations with hidden “treasures” in them. Secret locations are mostly scattered in places of historical, natural, cultural or geographical interest.

how-stake.title: How to stake KRAKEN?
how-stake.text: At the moment, the $Kraken token has not yet been launched. After the launch, you will be able to stake them and earn points. The more points you have, the more potential benefits you can enjoy.

safety.title: Is KRAKEN Safe?
safety.text: All smart contracts and software code undergo thorough audits to ensure there are no potential exploits or loopholes. We take the security and protection of your data and funds very seriously.
